title: LF>Lonely summoner for grinding end season rewards
body:
Add Shuku in game if you're interested. We're an all girl team and we're looking for 1 guy to carry us. :) just bein honest hehe <3

we're all silver 3 but if you're diamond or higher we'll let you carry us!

we all have Skype <333 cya soon!

replies.body: I just added you I don't know how well I can carry but I'll try my best coming from Plat 4 ;D

Howdy. 

While I'm not someone who can carry, I am lonely and wanting to grind end season rewards. I normally play sup, but can also play mid and top (Not as effective though).

Sent a request, feel free to get back if you need still want someone to make a 5's team whole/
